website_summaries.verdict: You can’t find a more pure and natural soft treat than these premium cuts of healthy cooked tuna.
pros: Simple soft and tender whole tuna chunks
cons: Small packets (about 3 grams each) can disappear quickly

customer_reviews.title: Only ONE Package Included-Buy Elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: I would give fewer stars if I could. The product itself is good. My cat loves the treats but you will only receive one package of 10 pouches. Previously when ordering these treats, I would receive 6 packages of the 10 pouches making the price a good deal. Now that they’re only including one package...you’d be better off buying this anywhere else really. This is a total ripoff. Great product but NOT worth $18.99 for 10 tiny pouches of cat treats. Buy elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Melina DeWeese

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: Totally overpriced! One very small piece of chicken in each package, making each piece about $2.00. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanene C.

customer_reviews.title: My cat jumps in the air to catch these.
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats, both rescues, and the boy kitty has very strong feral instincts. There's a notable lack of prey in my apartment, however, so he ends up spending most of the day moping. The highlight of his day is when we get a bag of these treats and start tossing them around for him to chase. He'll vault over furniture to chase them, jump in the air to catch them, and pounce on the ones we flick along the floor. I don't know what's in them that makes them so much tastier than other treats, but he loves them, and they don't upset his digestion like other brands of "filled" treats.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Elliott

customer_reviews.title: What Bowie wants... Bowie gets!
customer_reviews.text: My Bowie loves fancy feast meals, beck he looks identical to the cat on the package...so when I was informed about these treats, he had to have them. He loves every last flavor and coos when he wants them.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia F.

customer_reviews.title: WELL the other three loved it. We have been buying it since
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this at our local grocery for our sick kitty. WELL the other three loved it. We have been buying it since. Its a treat not a meal but all four of my kitties love it and would be happy if it was a meal!!!! Don't be fooled by the package. There are very small individual packs inside with a small amount in each, but like I said its a treat.....
customer_reviews.author: Linda farr

customer_reviews.title: My Cat goes nuts over these morsels!
customer_reviews.text: My Cat chewed through the package even before I opened it!!! Every time I get ready to reward my cat for a job well done, signal goes off that the treats are coming. The fact that it has two textures: Crunchy outside with a Soft middle I think is what makes this so much more magical to their taste buds. The only issue with the product is that it's too small, definitely need a few for a bigger sized cat. One is good for a kitten. Also, depending on the relentlessness of your cat, definitely put the treats in another zip bag or sealable storage and they will want to get their Paws all up into the Cookie Jar.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Less than $4 from Walmart
customer_reviews.text: All 4 of my cats go crazy for this kitty treat. They're wrapped individually which is a little annoying to unwrap each but I'm sure keeps them fresh. 100% love the product. However, this exact same product and qty is sold online at Walmart for $3.48 or a 2 pack of 10 pouches for $1.45. I love Amazon but this is an insane mark up. I bought this one first before I noticed and have since been buying them from Walmart. Same quality.
customer_reviews.author: StevieB1004

customer_reviews.title: The salmon flavor is cat heaven
customer_reviews.text: My pedigreed Chatreux can't live without the salmon flavored version of this product. He'll jump up on the counter below the cupboard where I keep them, waits for me to cut one up on a plate, yelps a thank you, and gobbles it up like he hadn't eaten in a week. He's not a fan of the chicken flavor and the tuna version makes his breath stink. Overpriced is an understatement but if you really love your cat you'll buy them anyway.
customer_reviews.author: SeaFree

customer_reviews.title: My Cat loves Purina Fancy Feast Purely Natural Cat Treats Variety Pack
customer_reviews.text: Renji my 3 yr. old cat, Loves these treats. When it is my Pill time, it doesn't matter where he is in the house...he beats me to the Kitchen. In fact if I should be on my computer he will come out to let me know it is pill/snack time. I have spoiled him a wee bit. He does not like big pieces of food so me, his mommy, tears this small treat up for him. One treat and he is happy. I rotate his treat so he is not eating all of one flavor before getting the next flavor. If my Cat, Renji, is Happy, then so am I.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J.

customer_reviews.title: My cats love these!
customer_reviews.text: My cats have always had Greenies for treats. I decided to try these just to give them something different to eat. At first, they were a bit skeptical. However, that did not last long, and they will now come to me begging for more. Yes, it drives me nuts, so I'm working on getting them in the habit of treats a couple of times per day instead of every 10 minutes, while alternating with Greenies.
customer_reviews.author: cher

customer_reviews.title: Great for treats and giving Medications
customer_reviews.text: These have been a real blessing for us, I have a 17 1/2 year old cat that has to take medication every day, not an easy task sometimes. I grind up the medication and add to water, then chop up these treats into the med mix, and my cat drinks the fluid and eats the treat, getting his full dose of medication. He considers it a treat, been doing it for over a year, and he still takes every morning. And the variety of flavors help to keep him from getting bored with it.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD R

customer_reviews.title: Fancy Feast Salmon Treats
customer_reviews.text: I have five cats and it seems that each one has their favorite treat. Only one of the five likes these but she is insistent about getting one every day. She gets other treats throughout the day but will sit next to me on the couch and tap, tap, tap on my arm to remind remind me about her salmon treats.If I don't respond to that she cries by the treat cabinet. I do have to break them up because she can't eat them right out of the package but she gobbles the pieces down. They are a little pricey but she's worth it
customer_reviews.author: P. Woodland

customer_reviews.title: Loved by cat, but very expensive
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves salmon and chicken as a treat. Usually I cook a piece of chicken or salmon and give him tiny bits of it as a treat, but wanted to avoid having to buy a larger quantity and waste most of it, just to give him treats. These are very tiny pieces of meat sealed in individual packets. Just the right quantity for a taste, and he absolutely loves them. However, the packet of treats costs as much as buying a pound of fish or chicken at the store and cooking it myself. Just too expensive to buy very often. If the cat could vote, he would say "Buy more!"
customer_reviews.author: VTgrandma

customer_reviews.title: Expensive treats, but always fresh and super convenient.
customer_reviews.text: Well, I don't love it....but my kitties do! We are retired and don't eat at home much, so we don't have a lot of "table scraps" of tuna, salmon or chicken for our 2 Ragdoll kitties. But they love these and they are very convenient. Yes, they are VERY expensive this way compared to saving some from your own cooking if you can. But they are always fresh and ready to serve. One packet is a perfect treat for your one or two kitties. We even trained one of our cats to "shake our hand" or "give us five" to get these! He will do anything for these treats!
customer_reviews.author: Burwells

customer_reviews.title: Great for disguising medicine!
customer_reviews.text: I have always had trouble giving medicine to my cats. I now use these on top of food that has the medicine mixed in. I sprinkle some of the treats on the top and bury some into the medicine/food mix and so far I have had great luck with two different cats eating all of it! I usually use two of the little packets to make sure that they have a great flavor disguise the medicine.
customer_reviews.author: JBNY

customer_reviews.title: Simply Salmon, Simply Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what it says--little single-serve vacuum packed pieces of salmon in water for your purrfect fur friend's snack. My cat LOSES HIS MIND for these--he is completely obsessed. I'm also very happy that they're simple, healthy ingredient snacks. I would compare it to canned tuna in texture & packing (but single serve). As for sizing, each snack is between a quarter and a half-dollar coin in diameter, and about 2-3 quarters thick. Much more than a single bite, but no more than 2-4. I break up the salmon (flakes like tuna from a can) and feed my baby little bites. He even begs for the salmon-flavored water from the pack at the end. :)
customer_reviews.author: debits&credits

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Cats on Special Diets
customer_reviews.text: We have one diabetic cat and one cat with kidney issues. Neither should really be eating traditional cat treats. Since these are simply one ingredient each, they work great for us. And maybe most importantly, the cats love them. We Subscribe & Save to them now.
customer_reviews.author: AmyL

customer_reviews.title: Our cat just loves these.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice little packets full of tuna - single serving size (though our Chessie certainly wouldn't mind if they were bigger lol). The nice thing is that unlike buying regular tuna, and having a can or bag full of it to keep refrigerated between treats, these little single-serve packets can be tossed away and the other, unopened packets stored in a cupboard. There's just so much less mess and inconvenience. The only downside is that you'll have somebody under your feet looking up at you with big anxious eyes every morning until she gets her treat :)
customer_reviews.author: Jack C

customer_reviews.title: My "critters" love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have the pickiest cats in existence. This is the only product all 5 love. The price is great and delivery is so fast.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: Our cats LOVE these & now expect a pouch each every day so this is now part of their daily routine. And if I forget, one of the cats reminds me by going to the place where it's plated for them! It's a tiny tiny bit but a great snack. My only concern, as with all fish, is the level of mercury as I assume food used for animals is of much lesser quality than human grade. :(
customer_reviews.author: ToTellTheTruth

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves these
customer_reviews.text: These little flakes of treat come individually wrapped with one treat per foil pouch. I had a feral cat give birth to 4 kittens in my yard. I got these for giving her treats by hand. These are soooo good that she approached me and took from my hand, and eventually allowed me to touch her. She recognizes the packages and gets really happy. They are expensive for the amount of treat. but the packaging makes it very convenient to have a few in your pocket. HUGS everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. H.

customer_reviews.title: Best Treat For Kitty Bonding and/or Training
customer_reviews.text: my cat is absolutely addicted to these treats...I take the chunks out of the packet and I flake off pieces feeding her by my fingers...it is an excellent bonding treat...I could use it to train her as well since my beloved cat (R.I.P.) before her I spent the first couple years doing training stuff...it literally just one ingredient of chicken, salmon, or tuna...it a treat that you don't feel like you putting some weird ingredients into your kitty's body
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: Highest Recommendation
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised. Excellent quality, great little portion for a treat, or an add on with dry food. Very well packed, and stay fresh. Kitty Luv, luv, Luvs em'. And a great value, I think 10 in a a pack, and box of 5 pouches.. I sighned up for monthly delivery on this item. As well as a few of their other new (newer) products. Highly recomm.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Cats flip for it
customer_reviews.text: The duos from Fancy Feast are like catnip to my cat. Crunchy outside, soft inside, the crunchiness helps keep my cat's teeth free of plaque. The vet remarked that it was incredible that a 5-yr old cat had such clean teeth. Don't use these as a substitute for their regular food though, as they don't have all the nutrients that a cat needs; lacking was taurine, essential for vision.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Sacchet

customer_reviews.title: Total Ripoff
customer_reviews.text: Just to be clear, you are paying almost $14 for ONE package of salmon treats that contains 10 vacuum sealed pieces of salmon. This is a total ripoff. The grocery store sells these for less than half of the price. I can't believe I fell for this and that I had one package of treats delivered in a huge empty box. Amazon usually has great prices, but this is ridiculous. Very disappointed. My cat will go through these in less than a week.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Breene

customer_reviews.title: too expensive
customer_reviews.text: This treat is the only thing that will get my sickly cat started eating whatever this tiny little chunk of meat lies on top of. So it is a little nugget of gold regarding getting my cat to eat, but it is breaking the bank to buy it. I have tried the same exact treat in the little cup with added broth and something in the broth makes my cat sick (he has beginning kidney failure); only this dry little chunk works for the purpose that I buy it.
customer_reviews.author: gabalot

customer_reviews.title: Your kitty will love you even more!
customer_reviews.text: Our cat, and the next door neighbor’s cat my wife insists on feeding ( which I am guilty of as well) absolutely love these treats. Make sure to squeeze the treat with your fingers before giving them to your kitty. They are sleek right out of the package and cats have difficulty biting into them without the treat being roughed up a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Buystoomuch

customer_reviews.title: My cat looooves these!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these treats! He has a stomach tumor which means he can’t have anything that upsets his digestion and these never have. I think it’s because these are 100% real meat. There are no weird ingredients that would cause any stomach issues. And he absolutely loves the taste of all of them! He even gobbles them down when he isn’t feeling well and refusing his normal food which is great because he will at least eat something. I highly recommend these for any cat especially for those with sensitive stomachs.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Allen

customer_reviews.title: Worth the bucks
customer_reviews.text: When you just rip open one of the individually wrapped treats, my cat almost has a seizure he's so in love with them! Better than catnip! Since there's nothing added, I don't see why my special needs dog can't have some. He can't use his tongue (that's right, he can't lick). So I need soft treats for him. I tried the chicken and he loved it. I wish they were on sale more because they are expensive. But really, they're worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: smilinCatskills

customer_reviews.title: For some reason she doesn't like the other treats we give her brother from another ...
customer_reviews.text: My little "Minnie Me" said to tell you she just loves her rotisserie chickens duos! For some reason she doesn't like the other treats we give her brother from another mother. They seemed too hard for her delicate, young lady's mouth. We got her the duos. Boy did she chow down on them, looking up like "Oliver asking for MORE, please".
customer_reviews.author: Dottie Giangrosso

customer_reviews.title: Miss Pickypants approves
customer_reviews.text: Mt cat is 19, and as she's aged, she's gotten even *more* picky when it comes to what she'll eat. She LOVES these treats. They look pretty good, and from what I can tell, they seem to be a small amount of tuna/salmon/chicken in a bit of broth. Amazon's the only place I've been able to get the variety pack with all three flavors, and the price is even lower than anyplace else I've shopped.
customer_reviews.author: J. Darnell

customer_reviews.title: Yummy 🤗 for kitty
customer_reviews.text: What can I say my kitty love this totally addicted chicken is the best it's an excellent value it's pretty much on point with what's in the store the convenience is the prime having it delivered and getting the actual product that you want instead of having to search flavors store to store
customer_reviews.author: audra

customer_reviews.title: Bianco approved
customer_reviews.text: My recently adopted kitty is quite over weight so I thought these would be a better treat option. He loves them and runs upstairs to his dish when he sees the package. A little extra exercise as a plus. He is already losing weight so his vet and I are happy.
customer_reviews.author: M.J. Fio

customer_reviews.title: Best Cat Snacks Ever.
customer_reviews.text: My little fuzzy guy LOVES these. I love being able to give him a most snack since, for him, the dry foods and snacks can cause crystals in his kidneys.
customer_reviews.author: TriciaTrojan

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best soft treats for old cats!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is 13 and doesn't have a lot of his teeth left, so these soft treats fit the bill. He gobbles them down followed by a genuine happy cat glow. See picture 😍. These have been difficult to find in the store lately. When I do, they're usually at least a couple of bucks higher, per package, than they are here. The shipment I received contained 5 bags of treats. Each bag has 10 individually wrapped treats. Each bag has an expiration date of Nov 2020. So, all in all, a great day for Norbert.
customer_reviews.author: Matt R

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves them !
customer_reviews.text: Cats are picky and when you find something he or she likes stick with it. My 17 year old cat loved these from the start so I always have them available for him. My only complaint is that when he chews them they break into small pieces that are a bit of a pain to clean up. If they were softer this probably wouldn’t happen. I’m still going to buy them though.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: When my diabetic cat, Fiona, won't eat anything else, she'll eat this
customer_reviews.text: My cat, Fiona, is diabetic. She can be finicky about eating at times. I've found a couple of Fancy Feast products that are my go-to foods for her. This whole line of "treats" turn into her meals when she gets finicky. Fiona seems to have a preference for "real" meat. These look like something even a human would eat. (That's coming from a vegetarian, so what would I know?) Fiona loves these, so I love these too. Thank you, Fancy Feast.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Great Kitty Treats
customer_reviews.text: These are the ONLY, and I mean ONLY, treats our two kitties will eat. It's gotten to the point that they yell at us a few times a day and go running to the pantry door to let us know they want more. We've taken to hiding the bags so they don't try and steal them and run off and eat the whole bag in one sitting. Glad we are able to order these in bulk. Cheaper than running to PetSmart every week to get more.
customer_reviews.author: Dick Lauder

customer_reviews.title: Ragdoll Tested...
customer_reviews.text: My kitties favorite treats! They will do anything for these. We taught them to "shake hands" and give us "5" to get them. So fun! They are not cheap, but worth it to make our little Ragdolls happy!
customer_reviews.author: Burwells

customer_reviews.title: Cat
customer_reviews.text: Our cat must have wet, prescription food which was a challenge because of a food allergy. Adding a taste of regular food did not work. With the addition of one "Purely Natural" his problem disappeared, and he eats his prescription food with relish.
customer_reviews.author: shade

customer_reviews.title: Purina Fancy Feast treats
customer_reviews.text: I have a 19 year Savannah Seta. She loves the Purina Fancy Feast Treats.I love that they come in a variety pack . She eats 3 packs a day .They are very soft and easy for her to eat . She only has 4 teeth , and begs for them after her Breakfast , lunch and dinner. She is one hungry little girl.
customer_reviews.author: cindy devito

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but quality!
customer_reviews.text: My kittens LOVE this snack. The go crazy for it. It’s really good quality from what I can tell, and the meat chunks smell pretty natural. I would say it’s expensive for how small it is. It comes in a little square around 1.5 inch, and the snack itself is smaller than an inch both sides.
customer_reviews.author: heejin jang

customer_reviews.title: BEST BEST BEST treat ever! My cat *loves* them!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is picky just like most kitties but this is the one thing that’ll make her come running when it’s time for the grueling task of giving her the daily asthma pill. She deals with that unpleasantness because she knows she’s getting one of these treats afterwards!
customer_reviews.author: Darcel

customer_reviews.title: Photo is misleading
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these expecting 6 because of the photo saying “6 pouches” but when I counted 5 in the box, I double checked and the description says “5 pouches.” It’s still about what I’d pay in the store, so it’s fine BUT I do feel the photo is misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Nguyen-ing

customer_reviews.title: Make this easier please
customer_reviews.text: It is too hard to tell if it is going to be canned cat food, a huge piece of tuna. Or a tiny flake of salmon!(?). Please give each one a NAME like Salmon flakes Canned cat food or la ge piece of salmon. Everything is labeled similarly and I can’t tell the difference when ordering
customer_reviews.author: Wondertrout

customer_reviews.title: The oil is important, too.
customer_reviews.text: I received exactly what I ordered, five 10-packs. My cats love this, including the oil that the salmon treats are packed in. Once a day, I give 2/3 of a salmon cookie to my larger cat, and 1/3 to my smaller cat. And I squeeze all the oil out of the pouch into a sink for them to lick up. It is the highlight of their day.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Bought a 10 pm but only received i bag.
customer_reviews.text: Hi i am tbroughly dissapointed with pacmaging of this product...WHERE ARE THE OTHER 9 BAGS OF THE TREATS I PURCHASED?.!!??!! My kitties, all 7 of them, enjoyed thier newly found yum yums but i a package of 10, 2 oz bags n only got 1 bag!!!!@ help me out wi this problem??!!??
customer_reviews.author: sweet thing 1

customer_reviews.title: The first cat treat that smells good to humans.
customer_reviews.text: As you can see from the photo, my cat is very agile; she runs and jumps at the speed of sound. So, she needs treats that inspire her and give her the energy she needs. She loves all 3 flavours, so I buy them in bulk. I bet your cat would love them too.
customer_reviews.author: SophiesMom

customer_reviews.title: High quality treat
customer_reviews.text: It's obviously high quality food. I'm a vegetarian so I really appreciate that I can give my kitty tidbits like these, as my "human food" isn't suitable for her, and she likes all varieties. I will definitely purchas again... and again....
customer_reviews.author: bxgrl

customer_reviews.title: Purina Fancy Feast
customer_reviews.text: My cat, Lucy, can't wait for these treats, her desserts!!! I have been a repeat customer for a while now & will continue. I've shopped around & Amazon subscribe & save is the best price. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Kesterson

customer_reviews.title: I have a 19 year old cat who’s health is ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a 19 year old cat who’s health is declining. He was not eating anything except for treats. So I found one bag of this at the grocery store and gave him a few packs of this a few times a day and he lapped it right up. So I have ordered more on Amazon for him. I’ve reordered a few times already. He loves this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Julia W

customer_reviews.title: Kittens Like Them.
customer_reviews.text: The cat treats have 3 favors, salmon, chicken and tuna. The tuna one tends to have more juice than the salmon than the chicken. Kittens react more exciting when opening the salmon, but they do begging for all three when opened.
customer_reviews.author: usagi

customer_reviews.title: great for snacking throughout the day.
customer_reviews.text: the only food our aging Pee-Wee eats without issue. small size means we can feed him snacks throughout the day without waste. easily flaked for cats with problems biting or breaking up hard food. not messy.
customer_reviews.author: j robin

customer_reviews.title: Mamma's happy, so everyone's happy!
customer_reviews.text: Cat loved it, so I loved it! A little pricier than other treats, but if it makes our kitten happy, we are certainly happy! Doesn't that sound just like a new mom? :)
customer_reviews.author: C. Farber

customer_reviews.title: Sneaky Siamese & the TUNA treats
customer_reviews.text: My Siamese, Kodis loves these. He did like the Salmon flavor but accidentally bought TUNA. He ditched the Salmon and insists on TUNA. I'm pretty sure that it's because it's MUCH more juicier. Even contains juice. Leaves my hands very smelly! The only negative is that he aggravates me for them. I have to hide them in did spot every time I try to put them up. Otherwise he will dig around til he finds them and sneaks away and chews through the package!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Michael

customer_reviews.title: Real bits of chicken, tuna or salmon. Kitty LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: My kitty loves these treats and I love them because they are real, unprocessed meat. Cats are carnivores. They don't want or need fillers and I don't want to pay for fillers and ash and grains that are not necessarily good for him.
customer_reviews.author: SassyKat

customer_reviews.title: Older cat loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My older cat, due to health issues, is not allowed grains, so it was perfect when my cats were given a packet of this, plus one of the tuna variety, for Christmas. They all go to her, because my boy cat won't even try it, but she loves it and it allows her to have the occasional treat. The only ingredient is the fish. I break it into smaller pieces for her and it disappears in no time. We're almost finished with the Christmas stash so I pleased to see this 5-pack come up on a lightning deal.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie J. Brashier

customer_reviews.title: RECEIVED ONLY 1 PACKAGE OF TREATS INSTEAD OF THE 6 THAT WAS PAID FOR
customer_reviews.text: This order was sent to my mother for her cat. It was the 2nd order I'd sent, the first about a month ago. That time, she received all 6 packages of the treats. This time, there was only one package of treats. I paid the full $20.82 and she only received one package.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl D.

customer_reviews.title: Smart treats
customer_reviews.text: While I try to keep the treats to a sensible limit, my cats really enjoy these and I know that they are getting pure protein treats of chicken, tuna and salmon, individually wrapped for portion control and hygiene.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Sommerfeldt

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced!
customer_reviews.text: U cannot believe that I just paid 15 bucks for one package of these treats! I read the questions about there being 50 total treats! I should have read the description! You can buy these treats at target for 5 bucks! Don't waste your time here!
customer_reviews.author: Veronique Pacopac

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: My cats about lose their minds. The salmon looks and smells good enough for me to eat. Beautifully packaged for easy breaking into smaller pieces. Obviously wonderful quality, I am so happy to know about these so I don't have to feel guilty about treating my cats!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kari Anderson

customer_reviews.title: A treat for your monster
customer_reviews.text: buy this if you enjoy having bloody fingers. my fat a-- cat who is lethargic in mood suddenly becomes Jaws when he sees me with one of these kitty treats. they are also strangely the size of a condom package. we refer to them as a cat condom.
customer_reviews.author: Miko

customer_reviews.title: Worth it, cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: These are individually packaged small pieces of real meat (chicken tuna and salmon). Its a bit pricey for how much you get, but my cat goes crazy over them so it's worth it. I just keep them as a special treat (or bribe).
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Riegel

customer_reviews.title: kitteh cracccckkkk
customer_reviews.text: Cats are happier creatures with the addition of these little morsels. But just don't run out or you will have furry junkies on your hands. They can't keep their paws off of them.
customer_reviews.author: Ariele

customer_reviews.title: Kitties LOVE these!
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey, but both my kitties LOVE them. They typically get one each per day, but I also use them as rewards after something they don't enjoy, like getting their ears cleaned out or getting their nails clipped. They tend to forgive me much more quickly if there's a treat involved.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Hand Down My Cat's Favorite
customer_reviews.text: It is so hard to find this in the store because they sell out of it all the time so I started auto shipment from Amazon. My cat Peanut LOVES this and eats a couple of these instead of can food.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy W

customer_reviews.title: Great kitty treat
customer_reviews.text: Actually,, my kitty loves it. I was afraid it would spoil her, but it is a treat and she treats it as such.I tear it apart a bit with a fork because she chases it out of the bowl licking it and trying to nibble at it if I don't. I tried the chicken but she only likes the salmon.
customer_reviews.author: Len

customer_reviews.title: Cat LOVES these treats!
customer_reviews.text: Our cat gets very excited when we are opening the package for these treats, she loves them! However, it is very difficult to remove the whole treat from the package without using a fork or spoon. Takes a long time for a treat!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Giannicchi

customer_reviews.title: Will always be my first choice when I buy treats.
customer_reviews.text: My cats absolutely love these treats! I cannot open the pouches fast enough for them! They are right there, waiting! The pieces are fresh and flavorful for their enjoyment.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki D. Wehner

customer_reviews.title: He loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My cat goes NUTS over these. When I pull out the package, he starts meowing around my legs like crazy. Our other 2 cats don't like them, but they also don't like chunky wet food. Only complaint is that it's a little pricey, which is why I watch for multi-packs or coupons.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B T

customer_reviews.title: Healthy treat! My cats beg for them
customer_reviews.text: My cats beg relentlessly for these treats. They are much better than some of the junk that is out there so I feel better about giving these as treats. They are a little pricey but they are convenient
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Mott

customer_reviews.title: Be Warned - Totally addicting
customer_reviews.text: My cat goes crazy for these treats. She loves the salmon flavor. Every morning she gets one crumbled over her Fancy Feast soft food. She loves treats alone too. If she had her way, she'd down all 10 treats at the same time. During the day she meows and runs to her bowl hoping I put more treats in it. Occasionally I surprise her.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Rusnak

customer_reviews.title: Great product but high price
customer_reviews.text: Have bought this product couple of times. Good product but overpriced for the quantity in the package.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bell

customer_reviews.title: My cat LOVES these!
customer_reviews.text: I have a diabetic cat who loves these. I can't stress enough how much he loves these. I'm unable distract him with any other food or treats when it's shot time, but I put this down and he neither notices nor cares he gets stuck with the needle.
customer_reviews.author: choise

customer_reviews.title: Kitty loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Never leftovers from my cat! The only thing that bothered me is that the product comes with little tiny packages (like tiny alcohol wipe packages) and you have to rip multiple to get a lot if you want to feed more for your kitty at a time but even then it’s not too bad! Very high quality kitty treat, a definite recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Vandy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect healthy treats for your babies !
customer_reviews.text: All three of my cats love this stuff - which is a relief since one of them turns up his nose at every other treat I have tried to give him. Very happy to see the ingredients are simply tuna, salmon, or chicken - Nothing else - no additives or "unknown" ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Yummy treats for finicky cat
customer_reviews.text: My cat absolutely loves these treats and he is very finicky. I just wish there was more in each pouch. You get 10 pouches in 1 bag and 5 bags with this order. My cat just goes thru them way too fast.
customer_reviews.author: Lauri

customer_reviews.title: Kat Loves These Treats
customer_reviews.text: Kat short for Katherine loves these additional treats. She is little spoiled and gets other treats as well however, she does really like these varieties. At times, I will give her 3 varieties in her treat bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid

customer_reviews.title: My cats' dream treats
customer_reviews.text: My cats salivate over these! Cannot get enough! And, they are 100% PURE fish - nothing else, no fillers and no bad ingredients. All natural treat that you can guarantee your cat is eating the healthiest treats out there!
customer_reviews.author: jhall

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: We buy these exclusively on line because they quit appearing in the stores. Our 8 year old cat gets one a day and knows the cupboard where they are kept. It’s tried and true at our house
customer_reviews.author: Lue Clark

customer_reviews.title: Real Meat Treats!
customer_reviews.text: My cats go crazy for these treats. I use them typically as a big treat reward for a good play session or after tolerating having something done like brushing or medicine taking. Of my 6 cats 5 of them coming running when they hear the packaging crinkle.
customer_reviews.author: Danielleshu

customer_reviews.title: Price shot up from $18 to $24. A couple bags weren't crunchy
customer_reviews.text: The pack of (6) used to be $18 just a few months ago and all the sudden they shot up to $24. Not really a deal anymore. I regularly alternate buying the salmon and chicken flavors. Twice now I've had (6) bags of the chicken flavor not be crunchy. Almost as if they've been sitting around so long and started to go stale. My cat didn't seem to like it despite normally enjoying these treats. Gonna stick with just the salmon for awhile, if this happens again I will abandon this product.
customer_reviews.author: Spartan40

customer_reviews.title: Her favorite treat
customer_reviews.text: My car loves these. There a great bite size snack for my spoiled cat. She loves all the flavors. The salmon is tender and the chicken is a little tougher, so she can’t just scarf them down, actually has to chew !
customer_reviews.author: Everydayme

customer_reviews.title: Must be good!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect snack size for my older cat with very few teeth. She looks forward to and reminds me at 3 daily that it’s snack time for her and her sister-lol.
customer_reviews.author: BENTON HOUSE

customer_reviews.title: Most popular treat for my wild boy, but beware of missing pouches in some orders!
customer_reviews.text: My seafood loving cat loves these! I have them on my subscriptions and usually get the advertised 5 pouches. However I was running low and made an extra order that was delivered today. It only had 1 pouch for over $17!!! I’m having trouble getting ahold of anyone to chat about this issue. I don’t know why the difference this time.
customer_reviews.author: Ania K

customer_reviews.title: Kitty Crack
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what the heck is in these things but they're like cat crack for every cat I've given them too (11 cats)! Even my most well-behaved cats try to tear it out of my hand and bite my fingers. Watch out!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal and excellent customer service by Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these! My first order I only received 5 packs and felt mislead as it states 10 packs of the salmon one but I contacted Amazon and I chatted with the nicest customer service person and he quickly corrected the mistake because it is for 10 packs! So I am placing my second order because this is a good deal half the price of the local grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: The cat is spoiled!
customer_reviews.text: My 17 year old cat loves these treats...he turns his nose down at less expensive treats. Makes it easy for me to order from Amazon. We spoil him now since he is the last of 4 cats and he's lonely.
customer_reviews.author: S. Macklin

customer_reviews.title: My cat LOVES these. The second i open the ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat LOVES these. The second i open the package and the cat smells this, I can hardly get the snack out of the package, he's nosing around so much. They are just a snack size, but we'll be trying the Purely meal size.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Delicate, tasty
customer_reviews.text: We used it for one of our small cats who does not eat as much as we would like. She's a fussy eater, but she gobbled these up!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Palmer

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this healthy one ingredient treat!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is picky when it comes to her food and treats. She absolutely loves these treats and I love that they have ONE INGREDIENT! Salmon. That's it. No additives or preservatives. Just salmon. These are a new favorite and we will continue to purchase. Very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Crista McRae

customer_reviews.title: Purina Fancy Feast Cat Treats
customer_reviews.text: Since my three cats love this treat, then they are the picky judges! These treats are a really good and economical deal.
customer_reviews.author: Garlic Man

customer_reviews.title: Diabetic cat APPROVED!
customer_reviews.text: These are the only treats my diabetic cat can have and he loves them!! We buy these by the case so when he gets his insulin shots twice a day he can have a treat after for being a "good boy" :)
customer_reviews.author: Homeschool Momma

customer_reviews.title: A quality healthy cat treat!
customer_reviews.text: My "Punkin" loves these quality tuna treats. We have a morning feeding ritual around it. These are not inexpensive so I try to purchase them in bulk. Regardless, they are a healthy treat that I feel most cats will love.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Great treat for our cat
customer_reviews.text: Our cat loves these and this was a good value. We give her one ever so often as a treat and she goes mad for them as soon as she sees the packet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THESE SNACKIES ARE A BIG DISAPPOINTMENT!
customer_reviews.text: I don't believe it? My cats really dislike these. I have 5 full bags and 1 almost full open bag. I have tried every which way I could to get them to eat these snackies! They are just not having it. What a failure 👎👎! SELLERS ARE GREAT THOUGH✔👍👌✌👋👏
customer_reviews.author: Mobie-Buyer

customer_reviews.title: My cat's favorite treat
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves the fact that this treat is moist. Most of her other food is dry kibble. She enjoys her Purina treats.
customer_reviews.author: mr blue

customer_reviews.title: My Suki LOVES them!
customer_reviews.text: One of my two cats absolutly LOVES LOVES this salmon! She almost exclusively wants his product now, so I vary between these and the little filets. These have high nutritional value and no detrimental ingredients which is nice. LOVE them.
customer_reviews.author: bbachmann

customer_reviews.title: Not my Cats' Favorite
customer_reviews.text: They are smaller and don't throw well (I use them to have the cats get exercise by running after them). They aren't too enthused about running to eat them either; not their favorite taste.
customer_reviews.author: stac

customer_reviews.title: Always loves this treat
customer_reviews.text: My cat is never finicky about this treat. He loves them. And it's really good quality food. So, I assume from his behavior that the Flavor and Scent are 5 out of 5. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Wink Mom

product_meta.title: Purina Fancy Feast Cat Treats
product_meta.description: Style:Meaty Bites| Flavor Name:Tuna| Size:(5) 10 ct. PouchesNew! Steam-baked to the perfect texture – not too juicy, not too dry – these flavorful little bites of flaked, real fish are anything but ordinary. Indulge your cat's love of seafood one bite at a time.
feature_bullets: Five (5) 10-Count Pouch - Purina Fancy Feast Purely Natural Hand-Flaked Tuna Cat Treats
Purely Fancy Feast Hand-Flaked Tuna Treats
Crafted From Select Cuts Of Real, Whole Fish
Lightly cooked for a perfectly tender texture, then flaked into flavorful little bites
Indulge your cat’s love of seafood with this naturally delicious treat

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
